sheetQuery.byCounty:
select m.process_instance_id, m.theme, m.city, m.country, m.station_name, to_char( m.create_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char( m.send_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), m.engineer, m.assignee, m.parent_process_instance_id, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select task_def_key_name from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), m.task_def_key_name) as task_def_key_name, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select task_def_key from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), m.task_def_key) as task_def_key, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select to_char(last_reply_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), to_char(m.last_reply_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) as last_reply_time from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.city and a.parentareaid = '28' and themeinterface = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and m.male_guest_state = '1' and ((m.last_reply_time - m.send_time) * 24 - 8) > 0 and @city@ and @send_time@
union all
select m.process_instance_id, m.theme, m.city, m.country, m.station_name, to_char( m.create_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char( m.send_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), m.engineer, m.assignee, m.parent_process_instance_id, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select task_def_key_name from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), m.task_def_key_name) as task_def_key_name, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select task_def_key from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), m.task_def_key) as task_def_key, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select to_char(last_reply_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), to_char(m.last_reply_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) as last_reply_time from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.city and a.parentareaid = '28' and themeinterface = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and nvl(m.male_guest_state, '0') in ('0', '3') and ((m.last_reply_time - m.send_time) * 24 - 8) > 0 and @city@ and @send_time@
